item.title: Start with Hugo on Github Pages
item.description: This is a comprehensive guide for creating your first static site using Hugo and hosting it on GitHub pages. Creating your site First, make sure you have Hugo installed on your machine. Now you can run these commands to make your first site. hugo new site hugo_site cd hugo_site And there you go! You’ve created your first Hugo site. I mean, there’s nothing in it, but still! Let’s take a look.
